biography.bio: Jacky Cheung was born on July 10, 1961 in Hong Kong as Jacky Cheung Hok Yau. He is known for his work on Once Upon a Time in China (1991), Une balle dans la tête (1990) and July Rhapsody (2002). He has been married to May Mei-Mei Lo since February 15, 1996. They have two children.
biography.name: Jacky Cheung

biography.bio: Kent Cheng was born on May 22, 1951 as Kent Cheng Juk-Si. He is an actor and director, known for Ip Man 2 (2010), Once Upon a Time in China (1991) and Crime story (1993).
biography.name: Kent Cheng

biography.bio: Joey Wang grew up in her native Taiwan, where she was spotted by a talent scout for a modeling agency. Her height and delicate beauty made her one of the most popular Taiwanese models, and Wang went on to have a successful film career. Her ethereal elegance was used to great effect by director Ching Siu-tung in A Chinese Ghost Story (1987) and its sequels. Wang has also appeared in dozens of contemporary feature films, including 'God of Gamblers' starring Chow Yun-Fat, and 'City Hunter' opposite Jackie Chan.
biography.name: Joey Wang

biography.bio: Cecilia Yip was born on March 8, 1962 in Hong Kong as Si-Si Lee. She is an actress and producer, known for The Swordsman (1990), Hong Kong 1941 (1984) and Et là-bas, quelle heure est-il? (2001). She is married to Louis Tan.
biography.name: Cecilia Yip

biography.bio: Eric Tsang was born on April 14, 1953 in Hong Kong as Chi-Wai Tsang. He is an actor and producer, known for Infernal Affairs (2002), Infernal Affairs II (2003) and Espion amateur (2001). He was previously married to Mei-Hua Wang.
biography.name: Eric Tsang

biography.bio: Cherie Chung was born on February 16, 1960 in Hong Kong. She was third runner-up in the 1979 Miss Hong Kong Pageant and entered the film industry afterward, becoming one of Hong Kong's most popular and beautiful actresses. Chung would go on to appear in dozens of comedy and drama movies, most notably starring along side actor Yun-Fat Chow in a host of films, including the award-winning An Autumn's Tale (1987). She also dabbled in a few action, horror and fantasy films, including that of Sister Yuen in Sammo Hung's ghost comedy La fureur du revenant (1982) and Hsiao-Hsueh in Eric Tsang's Jin yan zi (1987). In 1991, Chung retired from show business and married advertising guru Michael Chu in the United States. He was known for his achievements in the Hong Kong advertising industry; he passed August 24, 2007 from stomach cancer. Since her marriage, Chung has been active in promoting environmental protection and ran a furniture store in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Cherie Chung

biography.bio: Pat Ha was born in 1965 in Hong Kong, China. She is an actress, known for Tong chiu ho fong nui (1984), Hua jie shi dai (1985) and Hi, Fidelity (2011).
biography.name: Pat Ha

biography.bio: Richard Ng was born on December 17, 1939 in Guangdong, China. He is an actor and writer, known for Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life (2003), Winners & Sinners (1983) and Le flic de Hong Kong (1985).
biography.name: Richard Ng

biography.bio: Fung Woo was born on January 18, 1932 in Guangzhou, Guangdong, Republic of China as Wu Kai-sau. He is an actor and director, known for Police Story (1985), Les associés (1991) and Overheard 2 (2011). He was previously married to Wing-Ho Lui.
biography.name: Fung Woo

biography.bio: Billy Lau is an actor and writer, known for Mr. Vampire (1985), Police Story 2 (1988) and Eastern Condors (1987).
biography.name: Billy Lau

biography.bio: Charlie Chin was born on May 19, 1948 in Nanjing, China as Qin Xianglin Chin Hsiang Lin. He is an actor, known for Le flic de Hong Kong (1985), Police Woman (1973) and Winners & Sinners (1983). He was previously married to Josephine Siao.
biography.name: Charlie Chin

biography.bio: Hsiu-Ling Lu was born on January 29, 1962 in Taipei, Taiwan. She is an actress, known for Desire (1986), Biao cheng (1988) and Burn Phoenix Burn (1982).
biography.name: Hsiu-Ling Lu

biography.bio: Kin-Nam Cho is a director and actor, known for Chinese Torture Chamber Story 2 (1998), Deja Vu (1999) and Bao feng shao nian (1991).
biography.name: Kin-Nam Cho

biography.bio: Yau Hung Yiu is an actor and assistant director, known for Gwai ma hau yuen (1987), The Occupant (1984) and Jiang shi jia zu: Jiang shi xian sheng xu ji (1986).
biography.name: Yau Hung Yiu

biography.bio: Yasuaki Kurata was born on March 20, 1946 in Ibaraki, Japan. He is an actor and producer, known for Fist of Legend (1994), So Close (2002) and Blood: The Last Vampire (2009).
biography.name: Yasuaki Kurata
